TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlFormatExtensionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlFormatExtensionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlFormatExtensionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定服务说明格式扩展在一个或多个扩展点运行。

span.span: Specifies that a service description format extension runs at one or more extension points.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务说明格式扩展扩展了如何为使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web service 生成服务说明。A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET. 具体来说，服务说明格式扩展将 XML 元素添加到服务说明中。Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description. 当 SOAP 扩展构建为在 XML Web service 的客户端和服务器端运行时，这非常有用，因为有关 SOAP 扩展的信息不会放置在服务说明中。This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not placed in the service description. 如果要将有关 SOAP 扩展的信息添加到服务说明中，客户端可以解释它必须运行特定的 SOAP 扩展。If you want to add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension. 必须在客户端和服务器上同时运行的 SOAP 扩展的一个示例是加密 SOAP 扩展。An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension. 如果加密 SOAP 扩展仅在服务器上运行并且它在将返回值发送回客户端之前对其进行加密，则客户端必须运行 SOAP 扩展来解密 SOAP 消息。If an encryption SOAP extension runs only on the server and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message. 否则，客户端无法处理返回值。Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value. 使用以下步骤生成服务说明格式扩展：Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1. 生成一个从派生的类 。Build a class that derives from . 2. 将应用 到类，并指定应在其上运行服务说明格式扩展的扩展点。Apply a to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run. 3. （可选）将应用于 类，并指定类中充当新扩展点的成员。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify a member within the class that acts as a new extension point. 4. （可选）将应用 到类，并指定要与服务说明格式扩展生成的 xml 元素关联的 xml 命名空间前缀。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension. 5. 在配置文件的节中配置要运行的服务说明格式扩展 `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` 。Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务说明格式扩展可以运行的可用类型的列表包括内置于 ASP.NET 中的类型和 Web 服务器上配置的任何自定义类型。The list of available types with which a service description format extension can run include those built into ASP.NET and any custom types configured on the Web server. 以下列表列出了可使用服务说明格式扩展运行的 ASP.NET 中内置的类型：The types built into ASP.NET that can run with a service description format extension are in the following list: - - - - - - - - - 这些类都指由 ASP.NET 生成的服务说明中的各个部分。These classes all refer to sections, within a service description, that are generated by ASP.NET. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#2)]
